author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Prawn, Grapefruit & Avocado Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn, Grapefruit & Avocado Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 30 large prawn, cooked, peeled, and deveined
2 avocados, peeled, pitted, and cut into chunks or slices
175g baby salad greens, for the dressing
6 sprigs mint leaves, stems discarded, leaves torn

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing. Combine all of the ingredients together in a jar, and shake until blended.
Pat the shrimp dry with paper towels, and place in a bowl. Add 2 tbs of the dressing and toss.

Toss the grapefruit, radishes, avocados, scallions, greens, watercress, and mint leaves in a large bowl. Divide among 6 dinner plates. Arrange 5 shrimp on top of each, and drizzle with the remaining dressing. Serve immediately.
